tool.name: GNPAnnot Converters : FGenesH
tool.description: Convert output in GFF3, EMBL and specific input for EuGene combiner
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**Program encapsulated and developed in Galaxy by Southgreen**
.. class:: infomark
**Part of the GNPAnnot Converters package**
-----
============== Author: ==============
Gaetan Droc
-----
============== What it does: ==============
Convert FgenesH output in GFF3 and a specific format for EuGene combiner
-----
============== Output format: ==============
GFF3
EMBL
Specific format for EuGene
-----
============== Reference: ==============
http://linux1.softberry.com/berry.phtml
